description: This challenge is perfect if you're just getting started. The shift between the layouts will be a nice test if you're new to building responsive projects.
name: 3-column preview card component

description: The perfect project if you're learning how to interact with 3rd-party APIs. This challenge uses the Advice Slip API to generate random quotes of advice.
name: Advice generator app

description: This challenge is designed to sharpen your JavaScript and form validation skills. Working with dates in JavaScript can be tricky, so this will be a nice test!
name: Age calculator app

description: This challenge will be a perfect test of your layout and responsive skills. There's a tiny bit of JS for the mobile menu, but the focus is HTML & CSS.
name: Agency landing page

description: Practice your layout skills with this article preview component. There's lots of fun to be had playing around with animations for the sharing icons as well.
name: Article preview component

description: This layout looks simple enough, but there are some interesting details to it that will test your CSS skills. You'll also get to practice basic form validation.
name: Base Apparel coming soon page

description: This HTML & CSS-only challenge is a perfect project for beginners getting up to speed with HTML and CSS fundamentals, like HTML structure and the box model.
name: Blog preview card

description: Flex your layout muscles with this landing page challenge. You'll mostly be working with HTML & CSS for this project with a tiny bit of JS for the mobile menu.
name: Blogr landing page

description: This challenge will really test your layout skills. There are also areas that will require some JavaScript, such as the tabbed features section and the FAQ accordion.
name: Bookmark landing page

description: This calculator app will be a great test of your CSS and JS skills especially. If you're wanting to practice using Grid, this challenge will be perfect for you!
name: Calculator app

description: In this challenge, you'll be building out the entire app illustration from scratch. This will seriously test your CSS skills. So give it a go if you feel confident!
name: Chat app CSS illustration

description: Put your layout skills to the test with this HTML & CSS landing page challenge. This challenge includes a design for hover states.
name: Clipboard landing page

description: This challenge will be a nice test if you're new to JavaScript. It's also a great opportunity to play around with content animations and transitions.
name: Coding bootcamp testimonials slider

description: Building accessible forms is a crucial task for front-end developers. This challenge will help you practice building a form with several input types and validation.
name: Contact form

description: This challenge will test both your layout and state management skills. As visitors make pledges, your goal is to keep track of the changes.
name: Crowdfunding product page

description: In this challenge, you'll build a beautiful product page. We'll be putting your JS skills to the test with a lightbox product gallery and cart functionality!
name: E-commerce product page

description: This challenge will provide a nice test for your layout skills. If you're ready to move up from Junior challenges, this one is a great next step.
name: Easybank landing page

description: In this challenge, you'll create a bar chart component from scratch. We provide a local JSON file, so you can add the chart data dynamically if you choose.
name: Expenses chart component

description: In this challenge, you'll build an FAQ accordion. This is an extremely common front-end pattern, so it's an excellent opportunity to get some practice in!
name: FAQ accordion

description: In this challenge, you'll be building out an FAQ accordion. This is an extremely common front-end pattern, so it's a great opportunity to get some practice in!
name: FAQ accordion card

description: A nice layout-based challenge for beginners. This will test anyone who is new to multi-column and responsive layouts.
name: Four card feature section

description: This design has some nice layout challenges in it. A perfect training ground to practice your Flexbox and/or Grid skills.
name: Fylo dark theme landing page

description: This component has some interesting CSS challenges in the design. If you're looking to test your CSS skills, this will be a great project for you!
name: Fylo data storage component

description: This project is great if you're starting to get confident with slightly more complex layouts. The second section with the testimonial area will provide a nice challenge.
name: Fylo landing page with two column layout

description: A perfect challenge for beginners, this project will get you working with a two column layout.
name: Huddle landing page with a single introductory section

description: This challenge is perfect if you're wanting to practice your layout skills. If you're starting to get a bit more confident laying out a web page, give this project a go.
name: Huddle landing page with alternating feature blocks

description: Practice using pseudo-elements for styling extras and the CSS position property for the sections with curved edges.
name: Huddle landing page with curved sections

description: In this challenge, you'll be using two separate APIs together to create an IP Address Tracking app.
name: IP Address Tracker

description: Test your layout skills with this HTML & CSS only landing page. This challenge is perfect if you're starting to get confident in laying out web pages.
name: Insure landing page

description: This fun project will be an excellent way to practice DOM manipulation and form validation while also putting your HTML and CSS skills to the test.
name: Interactive card details form

description: This is project will put your JavaScript skills to the test. We provide a JSON file to pull the data, but it's also a perfect project to build as a full-stack CRUD app!
name: Interactive comments section

description: In this project, you'll build out an interactive pricing component complete with custom range input slider and pricing toggle. A perfect way to test your JS skills!
name: Interactive pricing component

description: This is a nice, small project to practice handling user interactions and updating the DOM. Perfect for anyone who has learned the basics of JavaScript!
name: Interactive rating component

description: Practice building out a sign-up form complete with client-side validation using JavaScript.
name: Intro component with sign-up form

description: This challenge will test your ability to create dropdown navigation menus, a common pattern on larger sites. It will also provide some nice basic layout challenges.
name: Intro section with dropdown navigation

description: In this challenge, you'll be using JavaScript to filter out jobs based on selected categories. We provide a local JSON file to help you practice working with JSON data.
name: Job listings with filtering

description: This will be a fun one! Your challenge is to build this countdown timer. There are lots of small CSS tests in the design as well. So it should keep you busy!
name: Launch countdown timer

description: This challenge is perfect if you're looking to test your CSS Grid chops. Even without Grid, this project will be a fun one to help you practice your layout skills!
name: Loopstudios landing page

description: This challenge will be a great test for your responsive skills. There are lots of small details and slight content shifts for different screen sizes.
name: Manage landing page

description: This mortgage calculator is an excellent project for practicing working with forms, client-side validation, and updating the DOM. Remember to focus on accessibility, too!
name: Mortgage repayment calculator

description: An excellent test for your form-building and JS skills, this project will pose many challenges along the way to completion.
name: Multi-step form

description: This HTML & CSS only challenge is perfect for anyone just starting out or anyone wanting a small project to play around with.
name: NFT preview card component

description: This news homepage will be an excellent opportunity to practice your CSS Grid skills. There will be lots of tricky decisions to make and plenty of learning opportunities!
name: News homepage

description: This will test your skills with basic form structure, validation, and submission. The success state will also be an excellent opportunity to work with DOM manipulation.
name: Newsletter sign-up form with success message

description: This project will be a brilliant test of your HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScript skills. You'll use JS to toggle the visual state of the notifications.
name: Notifications page

description: A perfect project for newbies who are starting to build confidence with layouts!
name: Order summary component

description: This challenge is great for beginners and offers a chance to practice basic client-side form validation.
name: Ping single column coming soon page

description: This challenge will get you thinking about building an accessible custom toggle control and also test your layout skills.
name: Pricing component with toggle

description: Practice updating the UI in multiple places based on user actions. The starter download also includes a JSON file to help you practice populating the DOM dynamically.
name: Product list with cart

description: This HTML & CSS-only challenge will be perfect for anyone starting to build responsive projects.
name: Product preview card component

description: This is a perfect challenge to test your layout skills. The card layout doesn't shift, so it's also great for those that haven't dived into responsive websites yet!
name: Profile card component

description: Some interesting layout and code challenges are baked into this design. Perfect if you're a beginner who is starting to get a bit more confident with your layouts.
name: Project tracking intro component

description: A perfect first challenge if you're new to HTML and CSS. The card layout doesn't shift, so it's ideal if you haven't learned about building responsive layouts yet.
name: QR code component

description: If you're wanting to test your JavaScript skills this is the challenge for you. Use whichever JS framework you prefer and pull data from the REST Countries API.
name: REST Countries API with color theme switcher

description: This challenge will help you focus on writing semantic HTML. Ensure you think through what HTML elements are most appropriate for each piece of content.
name: Recipe page

description: This challenge has something for everyone. It’s a HTML and CSS only project, but we’ve also provided a JSON file of the test results for anyone wanting to practice JS.
name: Results summary component

description: This challenge will test your HTML, CSS and JavaScript skills. There's even a Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock version if you really want to challenge yourself.
name: Rock, Paper, Scissors bonus game

description: This challenge will test your HTML, CSS and JavaScript skills. There's even a Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock version if you really want to challenge yourself.
name: Rock, Paper, Scissors game

description: This small homepage challenge packs a big punch to test your layout skills. There's also a slider in there to add a JS layer for extra practice.
name: Room homepage

description: In this challenge, you will build out the pricing component to the designs provided. This is perfect for beginners and people who want to complete a smaller challenge.
name: Single price grid component

description: In this small project, you'll build out your social link-sharing profile. You can even personalize it and use it to share all your social profiles!
name: Social links profile

description: This challenge will be a perfect chance to practice your Grid skills. The color theme switcher also adds a nice additional test.
name: Social media dashboard with theme switcher

description: This project will test your layout skills. If you're starting to get confident with Flexbox or Grid, this will provide a nice challenge!
name: Social proof section

description: This project is a fun collaboration with Scrimba and Kevin Powell! If you like, you can follow along and watch Kevin complete the project on Scrimba. Lots to learn!
name: Space tourism multi-page website

description: This is a great small challenge to help get you used to building to a design. There's no JS in this project, so you'll be able to focus on your HTML & CSS skills.
name: Stats preview card component

description: This challenge will be perfect practice for anyone wanting to test their CSS Grid skills. Grid is such a powerful addition to CSS, so it's worth getting to grips with it!
name: Testimonials grid section

description: A perfect opportunity to practice your CSS Grid skills. For anyone wanting to take it up a notch, we provide a JSON data file to practice working with data.
name: Time tracking dashboard

description: This small app is perfect for anyone starting to get to grips with JavaScript. The calculator functionality will be a nice test!
name: Tip calculator app

description: The classic todo app with a few twists! This app includes a dark/light theme toggle and drag & drop reordering for anyone wanting an extra test.
name: Todo app

description: Integrate with the Clean URI link shortening API and play with browser storage in this landing page challenge.
name: URL shortening API landing page
